Please join me through http://my.perrier-jouet.com <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGP_BRD_1701_PJ_MyPerrierJouet_Page_SignUp.html?utm_source=thankyou-edm-yan-reblast]]> to register and unlock all the special member privileges.
I hope to see you again soon,
Marie
